Not just that... on TPB oly one can find two dozens of 2 GB and bigger - but plenty people cannot afford that.

Needles to say - I am not the problem... I can seed as fast as you want - but you are over-stretched and your speed both in download and upload must be balanced with your wishes. I know you are doing best you can - but please, try to "harmonize" your wishes with reality.

"Do not stuff in your mouth more than you can swallow." I've been taught as kid.

Hey 20/40, I don't know if you are taking any requests or not, if not just disregard this cause I know you are probably busy.....  but if you are, maybe I could add Mirrormask to your list? I totally understand if you can't though. 
Thanks for all the great Movies/TV!! You're kinda a great one-stop-shop for it all!
